headline: Lululemon Stock Analysts See Lost ‘Year’ of Earnings, ‘Show Me’ Story
summary: Instead of proving out its U.S. turnaround efforts, the brand’s second-quarter earnings last week revealed a big de minimis hit and showed how much work there is to be done.

raw.headline: Lululemon Stock Analysts See Lost ‘Year’ of Earnings, ‘Show Me’ Story
raw.summary: Instead of proving out its U.S. turnaround efforts, the brand’s second-quarter earnings last week revealed a big de minimis hit and showed how much work there is to be done.

headline: September Doesn’t Need to Be Scary for Stocks. This Year Could Prove It.
summary: September has a fearsome reputation in the market, but it can be easy to dismiss concerns about monthly performance as superstitious or “astrological,” as Trivariate Research Founder Adam Parker puts it.  When it comes to  performance over the year, the index is a Capricorn, with January the winner historically.

headline: Stocks Set to Open Higher as Fed Rate-Cut Expectations Rise, U.S. Inflation Data Awaited
summary: September S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESU25) are up +0.26%, and September Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQU25) are up +0.34% this morning, pointing to a higher open on Wall Street as investors boosted their expectations for how much the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates this year.
